OptionPackage.DisplayName: G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210

Comment.MultiLanguageText: error word of the function block
highword of the highdword of the 64Bit number
lowword of the highdword of the 64Bit number
highword of the lowdword of the 64Bit number
lowword of the lowdword of the 64Bit number
mask to seperate the algebraic sign
mask to seperate the exponent field

LineComment.Text: initialization of internal variables
allocation of the two dwords of the energy counter value
seperate VZ (sign bit)
seperate CH (exponent field with offset(cBias))
seperate exponent of the 64Bit value
check the algebraic sign
negative counter values indicate an error
check the special case of the 0 value and the value < 1
the output values have the format dint --> 0,1 is not possible
*** If the exponent is smaller than 29 the number is smaller than 1.000.000.000
*** You have to seperate the valid bits (sExp)of the mantissa
*** At the end you have to add the hidden 1 Bit
*** If the exponent is 29 the number is between 536.870.912 and 1.073.741.823
*** You have to subtract 1.000.000.000 if it's bigger than 1.000.000.000
*** The result ist the fine counter value
*** If the exponent is bigger then 29 you have to divide the number by 1.000.000.000
*** the rest of the division is the fine counter value
Initialisation of sResDiv for new division
*** If the exponent is smaller than 9 the number is smaller than 1.000
*** The raw counter value is 0
*** If the exponent is 9 the number is between 512 and 1.023
*** You have to subtract 1.000
*** The result ist the raw counter value
*** If the exponent is bigger then 29 you have to divide the number by 1.000.000.000
*** the result of the division is the raw countervalue
